body.name: Saybrook Adjustable Loft Pillow - Hypoallergenic Bamboo Cover, Lion Down Alternative Filling with Memory Foam and Microfiber Gel Beads - Standard/Queen

features: Fully Adjustable Pillow: Get the exact right loft and firmness level for your body and sleep position. Remove or add back as much filling as you want. Want a firm, lofty pillow? Simply wait 24 hours after unpacking for the overstuffed pillow to expand. Want a soft, thin pillow? Remove a generous amount of filling and store it in the pillow's original packaging for safekeeping. Get the loft you prefer for both him and her.

The Highest Quality Standards: Lion Down Alternative filling is made with high-end memory foam for viscoelastic support and silky microfiber plumes that mimic the air capacity of down. The material is hypoallergenic, soft, and cruelty-free, and it comes infused with silicone gel beads to passively regulate temperature. The outer cover is now updated with a premium YKK zipper, widely known as the gold standard of zippers.

Lustrously Smooth, Lustfully Soft: The outer bamboo cover is zippered for easy removal. The bamboo cover is machine-washable, hypoallergenic, eco-friendly, and extra-breathable. Feel the soft texture and experience the enhanced airflow of our premium fabric. Designed to evoke the Venetian waterways, the gridline cover adds an extra touch of luxury to the Saybrook pillow.

Satisfaction Guaranteed: We know you'll love this pillow, and we back our confidence in our product with a 30-day full-refund guarantee upon return, no questions asked. If this isn't the pillow of your dreams or if the support isn't quite right, then we can at least provide the best customer support.

Lie Down with Lion Down (Not made with real down or real lions): Lion Down Alternative will be the best pillow material you ever sleep on. Unlike other blends of memory foam and poly-fiber, our modern memory foam uses the latest in viscoelastic technology for true memory foam action. The microfiber plumes mimic down softness more closely than other poly-fill materials. No more lumpy pillows. The winged lion of Saybrook produces only the most comfortable experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjust the loft to any height Customize your pillow easily by removing or adding back filling. Achieve perfect posture alignment in any sleep position you prefer for both him and her. The pillow comes densely packed and lofty, which enables the full range of adjustment. If you prefer a thin, soft pillow, simply remove a generous amount of filling.

Lie down with Lion Down Lion Down Alternative is a special, luxurious gel-infused blend of memory foam and microfiber. The material is hypoallergenic, soft, and cruelty-free. The microfiber technology creates silky plumes to mimic down while the memory foam provides viscoelastic support. Silicone gel beads passively regulate temperature, so you can sleep haute, not hot.

Feel the texture of the bamboo cover The lustrously smooth and lustfully soft bamboo fabric is extra-breathable, hypoallergenic, and machine-washable. Designed to evoke the Venetian waterways, the removable cover adds an extra touch of luxury to the Saybrook pillow.

Reuse the packaging Store any unused filling in the zippered bag to reduce waste and to keep some removed filling as backup. The bag is designed to contain exactly the right amount of removed filling for a soft, flexible pillow when the bag is packed to the brim and the filling is stuffed as densely as possible.

Upgraded YKK Zipper Get the highest quality materials in every part of the pillow, even the zipper. Saybrook pillows have received a recent upgrade in April 2021 with YKK zippers to ensure easy operability when you need to adjust your pillow.

Adjust the pillow for perfect alignment Adjust the pillow to any loft you wantExperience a pillow perfectly tailored to your body and sleep preferenceEach pillow comes stuffed with a generous amount of filling (Please allow 24 hours for filling to expand after unpacking)

Works for any sleep position Whether you sleep on your side, back, or stomach, the Saybrook pillow has you coveredYou can get the perfect bespoke loft by removing as much filling as you wantYou can also adjust the firmness by removing more filling and fluffing the pillow for a softer experience, or keeping more filling in for more support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is this finally the one!!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm not exaggerating when I say I have been looking for a pillow for months now. My favorite pillow I probably had for 20 years I finally had to get rid of due to neck pain. I didn't realize finding a new one would be so difficult. Every new pillow I ordered and tried eithier wasn't comfortable or I would wake up with neck pain. I did find one from my chiropractor that worked but wasn't my favorite in the world. But at least I wasn't waking up with neck pain during my search. Also was getting frustrated with some places requiring return fees or shipping fees to return them.I was reading online reviews and someone did a test of different ones for side sleepers and recommended this. This was my first "adjustable" pillow I got. The inside padding seemed pretty good quality and after 2 nights, I am in love. I'm a side sleeper and still need support, but don't want my head to be turned up too much, or have that bump that so many pillow have in my neck. Super not comfortable. I also didn't like ones where your head has to stay in the middle of the pillow the whole time as I do toss at night or like to find the cool spot of the pillow.I have to admit once it unraveled and fluffed up, I probably took out half of the memory foam inside. But for the first time in what seems like months, I'm excited to lay on a pillow again. It's flat like I like it, and firm, but just squishy enough so not like sleeping on a board and can hold. My wife thinks it's too firm for her but she likes to sleep on super squishy pillows.The one very minor critique is the first night it seemed to get a little warm, but I just put a cooling pillow case over it and all fixed. Last night I feel alseep so fast and woke up with no back or neck pain. Finally!!! Very Happy with this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I want to start by saying, this is an amazing pillow. I love the support I get for my neck and shoulders. I did however had to take out plenty of the foam inside to get it to where is was comfortable to me. After removing the foams, omg, when I laid my head on the pillow it was so comfortable, and soft but still firm. I am very happy with my Saybrook pillow. I highly recommend it. It is an amazing pillow, you just have to be patient and get it to where you want it to be to get it comfortable for you. Thanks Saybrook for a wonderful pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adjustability is the best feature
reviews.reviewText: So far I’ve had this pillow for about a week. I had to remove a good amount of the filling. I stuffed the round cylinder container full. The pillow is firm with enough softness to support my head. I sleep on my side and back. The biggest issue is getting the pillow out of the cylinder zip package. I managed to get it off after struggling but I think it would be difficult for an older person to open. You can’t cut the package off or you’ve damaged your container to store the filling you remove. You could also cut the pillow. They should change that. It was a ridiculous amount of effort. The bamboo cover is very nice. I was going to use pillow covers but don’t need them with this pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pillow is amazing! I made an extra standard size from the kins
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this pillow because I was consistently having neck pain with my old, down pillows. After using this pillow, for the first time in several years, I woke up pain-free. I chose the king size. What I found, was that the pillow was stuffed to the gills. I took an old, zippered, standard-sized pillowcase, and filled it with leftovers. I now have two amazing pillows!I recommend purchasing Sureguard waterproof pillowcase covers if there’s any chance something might be spilled on your pillow. The pillow filling cannot be laundered. But, it’s so good at what it does – supporting your neck – that the pillow is worth it, and, if you protect it, you will never have to worry about laundering it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very honest review please read
reviews.reviewText: First memory foam pillow I’ve owned after countless standard pillows. I am extremely hard on pillows, I wear out and replace at a 3:1 ratio vs my wife. I’m 6’2” and 230 pounds, a side sleeper primarily but am in all positions of sleeping every night. I need a lot of loft in a pillow so 80 percent of the pillows sold in stores are disqualified for being flat when new. Read reviews of Coop, Saatva, Squishy Pillow, Layr, countless others along with down pillows and ultimately 20 plus articles on pillows. I decided to give this one a try based on the quality of the foam vs others and I will say that it appears to be of high quality and is very consistent without any other filler or irregularities in size . I have not removed any filler at all, this pillow is soft with plenty of loft for anyone and has maybe 10% or less “too much” loft for me but I figured after a month it will be perfect so I left it alone and I was right. The good is it’s holding up well and has great softness and support as you go to sleep and sleeps very cool. The bad is this memory foam pillow definitely has a memory and once you are sleeping it continues to sink well beyond a minimum loft for me. I find myself flipping the pillow in the middle of the night to the non compressed side to regain loft and go back to sleep, my neck is hurting at this time. I awake in the morning with the pillow again compressed and neck hurting, this pain is continuing into the morning of each day for a period of hours. I have never had neck pain, ever, only back pain. It’s very hard to show in a picture the pillow compression but it’s a lot and if you don’t touch the pillow in the morning when you go to bed that night it will be exactly as you left it that morning, compressed. These pictures are taken day and night both and obviously with a heavy head placed it’s worse than the picture. Sadly this pillow cannot make it through the night giving support, you fluff the pillow and it’s good for another period of time but will fade well before morning. Daily neck pain and fading support in a few hours reflects my 3 star review. It will outlast a standard fiber filled pillow no doubt, has plenty of fill and is soft but falls short of a full night sleep. Maybe a smaller back or stomach sleeper will have better luck but expect support to fade hour by hour until flipped or fluffed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Saybrook pillow
reviews.reviewText: I love my new pillow. No more having pillow move or go flat. Pillow stays in place and is comfy. You can adjust the pillow for how you like it by removing and storing filler. I would recommend

Very full of filling, I needed to take a bunch out so it was thin enough for me as a side sleeper. But the filling is quite dense and does not appear to heat up much at night. I have spend hundreds on pillows in the past, so far this one is the best pillow I have ever owned.

Good quality & finishing pillow. However a bit hard for me even though remove some of its fill. Honestly down feather pillow still the best for comfy rest. Only pitfall it has to be fluff else shape out.
